price: 8. Yalli keenil gacisak iyyeh :Nanu malayka moobisna cakkil finqa kah fanna marih digaalah ken oobisna nee akke waytek, toysa malayka ken digaalah obta waqdi usun wadirroysima mara hinnon.
arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā nunazzilu al-malāikata illā bil-ḥaqi wamā kānū idhan munẓarīna
